document.full_text: schalke and real madrid moved to the brink of a place in the last four of the champions league by recording heavy wins in the first legs of their quarterfinals on tuesday.
document.title: fc schalke 5, inter milan 2; real madrid 4, tottenham hotspur 0: schalke tops defending champion inter milan
lines_and_colors: schalke and real madrid moved to the brink of a place in the last four of the champions league by recording heavy wins in the first legs of their quarterfinals on tuesday.
